item.description:
Turning the Key: Short Sale Secrets

With so little equity in so many properties, many investors are running away! "You're missing out on a huge opportunity in this market" says investor and coach James Gage. Join us on April 3rd for Turning the Key and find out how Jim is using Lease Options and Short Sales to cash in on this upside down marketplace!


Register today and reserve your seat for the April 3rd Turning the Key! For more information or to register you can visit our website at ForeclosuresMass.com or call us at 617-275-4800.

Register early and get $5 off admission price!

group.name: Real Estate Networking/Education Meeting in Boston

item.name: ForeclosuresMass' Turning the Key Networking/Education Event April Meeting
